titles.title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to clarify the criteria by which a fiduciary may evaluate and select investments based on nonpecuniary factors, and to clarify the application of prudence and exclusive purpose duties to the exercise of shareholder rights.
